PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: A System for Supporting Cross-Lingual Information Retrieval
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
To improve the precision and recall of cross lingual information retrieval(Hindi and English) . 
Applied combined approach of edit distance and vector space model, which improved retrieval of documents.
Analyses current stock rates and tells buyers which stock will be more profitable.
Development of the system in Java, including the front-end, back-end, creating its database in Oracle and linking it to the website.
In this project, a gender, age and skin tone identification algorithm has been proposed. It identifies in near real time by utilizing all possible characteristics of human face

Link prediction using unsupervised face recognition in which we used facebook photos to predict links between people in the photos.Using this architecture we predicted friendship links between people so we could suggest them common pages, likes, dislikes, applications, advertisement etc. along with mutual friends.
Developed a 3-D virtual walk-through of a part of IIIT-A  Campus  using Google Sketchup and copper cube and published it in WebGL.
